item.title: R Data Structures
item.description: The data structures we will cover: Vectorswords Matricies Lists Data Frame Factors Tables For each data type, we will review the basics of: Creation Adding Element Deleting Elements Indexing Filtering and More Vectors Introduction All elements in an R vector must have the same mode: integer, numeric, character, logical, complex, etc. Creation x <- c(88, 12, 23, 74) x ## [1] 88 12 23 74 Adding Element Adding -44 to vector x:

item.title: Network Theory Notes
item.description: These notes were written using Networks - An Introduction (Mark Newman).

item.title: Create Smarter Goals
item.description: If you are anything like me, passion and self-motivation compels you to generate ambitious goals. I sometimes even write them down and share them with friends and family. Then, I sit back and contentedly coddle myself in satisfaction for merely creating this goal hoping it will provide direction and purpose. I do this all while holding onto the illusion that I am responsibly evaluating my needs and assessing my possible futures.
